Text: Huh?
Head to Pandora's Fortunes
Good old Pandora's Fortunes... I hope Aki's doing okay.
A lot has changed, I hope my old home in the pipes is okay.
Huh, what happened here?
I better get home and let this sink in.
Head Home
This is...
Flick up/down on k : Lunar / Jupiter Styles \n Tap k : Revert to Normal Style
Hmm, not this way...
Is this... \n Hekseville?
How's that possible!? \n Did I come back alone?
Okay... Stay calm.
First things first... \n I should check on \n my old home.
It's like they turned my \n home into a garbage \n dump!
I don't see Cyanea or \n Gade, what happened to \n this city?

*Sigh* So much trash... 
 Guess I'd better get 
 started by recycling 
 these old newspapers.
Hey! This paper's \n talking about the \n Endestria Incident...
Kat, the Gravity Queen \n "Alias Defeated" \n "The Town is Safe"
Alias... Everything \n feels like it happened \n so long ago...
Hm?
Pandora's Fortunes
We reveal the truth \n "Mademoiselle Aki"
Aki! That's who I should \n go see!
She can use her strange \n powers to tell me what's \n going on.

No use getting down 
 about all this. Just 
 have to pick myself 
 right back up!
It's like they turned my \n home into a garbage \n dump!
I don't see Cyanea or \n Gade, what happened to \n this city?

*Sigh* So much trash... 
 Guess I'd better get 
 started by recycling 
 these old newspapers.
Hey! This paper's \n talking about the \n Endestria Incident...
Kat, the Gravity Queen \n "Alias Defeated" \n "The Town is Safe"
Alias... Everything \n feels like it happened \n so long ago...
Hm?
Pandora's Fortunes
We reveal the truth \n "Mademoiselle Aki"

*Sigh* 
 I can't believe 
 Pandora's Fortunes 
 is gone.

Hekseville feels 
 so familiar and 
 unfamiliar at the 
 same time.

No use getting down 
 about all this. Just 
 have to pick myself 
 right back up!
What's this weird black \n building? What happened \n to Pandora's Fortunes?
Did she go out of \n business while I was \n gone?

*Sigh* Everything's so 
 different - like those 
 weird robots hovering 
 around town.
What happened to \n Hekseville?

Uhm, excuse me! Can you 
 tell me if anything 
 strange happened to 
 Hekseville?
Hm? That's a strange \n question to ask someone \n out of nowhere.

Well, I just got back 
 into town, so I'm a 
 little behind on the 
 latest news.

Ah well, it's good to 
 hear a young person 
 taking an interest in 
 societal affairs.
I suppose the big deal \n now is who's fit to be \n the new mayor.

Personally, I think the 
 person responsible for 
 our cutting-edge city 
 defence system should-
I'm not quite sure \n I follow him...

Got it! Guess I should 
 go learn more about the 
 defence system and the 
 mayor.
That's the spirit! You \n can never have enough \n knowledge, young one!
Hello, mind if I ask you \n something?
Of course not, you must \n be new around here. Need \n directions?
Oh no, I used to live \n here.

What's the problem then? 
 If you're selling 
 something, I'm not 
 buying.

No, no, nothing like 
 that. I just want to 
 catch up on what's been 
 happening lately.

Well, if you're just 
 looking to chat, ask 
 someone else. I'm a bit 
 busy.
Okay... Thank you for \n your time.

Did I just get the 
 brush-off? Doesn't 
 anyone around here 
 recognise me?
Hi! Cute dog you've got \n there.
I'm not supposed to talk \n to strangers.
You don't know who I am?
Your mummy and daddy \n never told you about the \n Gravity Queen?
No...
I ain't heard of her \n either. We should call \n the cops.
What? No, wait.
Yeah, that's what mummy \n told us to do!
Okay, okay, relax, I'm \n going away now.
The kids here sure are \n suspicious of people...
Citizen Registration?
Wow! The robot can talk!
Please submit your \n citizen registration.
Registration? \n What's that?
Registration is \n a civic duty.
Please register at your \n earliest convenience.
Hmm, wonder when that \n whole system went in...
Unregistered citizens \n may experience several \n inconveniences.
I'll bet registration \n is a real hassle...
I'll be sure to do it \n later!
Repeat: Unregistered \n citizens may experience \n several inconveniences.
Hmm? Haven't I seen you \n somewhere before?
Finally! \n Someone who \n recognises me!
Yep, I'm back! Sorry to \n worry you all.
Right, right, thank you \n for helping protect our \n town.
Things were pretty rough \n without me, right?
What do you mean? You've \n been here protecting us \n for years now.
Wait... You look a \n little younger than I \n remember.
Could be my eyes, \n they're getting old with \n the rest of me.
*Sigh*
She obviously mistook \n me for someone else. \n But who?

Hey, do you know what 
 happened to the fortune 
 teller that used to do 
 business here?
Fortune teller... Oh, \n right! Pandora's \n Fortunes.
That's the place! \n I'm looking for Aki, \n she used to run it.

I think she was evicted 
 so the town could 
 construct the defence 
 system here.
Rumour has it, she made \n out like a bandit from \n the deal.
She's probably off \n somewhere living the \n good life.
Of course, who knows \n where that is.
I see...
Where could \n Aki have gone?
Hey, uh, how's \n Hekseville these days?

Pretty good, I'd say. We 
 don't have to worry 
 about gravity storms 
 anymore...

The man who gave us 
 Grigos and Bubs should 
 be praised for their 
 fine work.
Grigos and Bubs...?
I'm beyond lost...
Hey, could you tell me \n what those round robots \n wandering around do?
Round robots... \n You mean the Grigos?
Is that what they're \n called? Sorry, I've been \n gone a while.

Well, they're part of 
 the town's defence 
 system. They keep us 
 safe.
They record the daily \n goings-on...
And they'll perform \n police duty in a pinch.

Heck, you ask me, 
 they're better than the 
 police. They're around 
 when you need 'em.
I see... They sound \n pretty impressive.
Speaking of police, \n I wonder where \n Bulbosa and Chaz are...
Whenever one Nevi goes \n down, more come to take \n its place.
Is that hand growing out \n of the gravity storm \n controlling them?
Maybe if I take it out, \n I can take the others \n out with it!
I'm kinda hungry...
I should grab something \n to eat!

Maybe one of the 
 stalls in the plaza has 
 something I could 
 nibble on.
'Scuse me, one sausage \n please!
Comin' right up. Careful \n it's pipin' hot.
It smells fantastic!
What's this?
Bubs deployed. \n Commencing gravity field absorption.
A gravity storm...
Angel at your service. \n With me, you have nothing to fear.
Wh-Who's she?
Ehem, I'm the town's \n guardian, Kali Angel!
Huh? \n Guardian?
Don't have time to talk. \n No rest for the \n righteous!
Wha-!?
Attention citizens. \n The alert has been lifted.
Thanks, \n Kali Angel!
That was \n incredible!
When I grow \n up, I wanna \n be an angel!
You \n promise?
My little angel. \n I'd love to have a \n sister like you.
I love you, \n Kali!
Aww, move it will ya? \n I can't see Kali with \n you in the way.
Aah!
Huh? \n Wait...
It IS you! \n When did you \n get back?
Heeey! \n Pops! \n Over here!
Ooh! \n Hey, Kat!
Aujean!
So that \n means you're...
Eugie, but don't go \n makin' a big deal \n about how big I got.
Kid hit a growth spurt. \n Bound to be bigger \n after three years.
Three years!?

I had returned, alone, to Hekseville. In the years that passed, it had \n a new defence system and a new hero. The time distortion effects from \n my interdimensional journey left me with some catching up to do.
Guess I have to learn more about what's changed here.
Gather Information
'Scuse me, can I ask you something?
Busy, huh? Okay, I'll ask someone else.
Hey, mind if I ask a question?
Oh? Alright, I'll keep asking around.
Hey, give that back!
Chase the Bird
So much for my meal...
Maybe I should ask around that black building.
I should ask around here.
Hmm, not this way...
Grigo: \n Incoming gravity storm. Seek shelter immediately.
Gravity storm? What's that thing talking about?
It wasn't kidding about the storm, there are Nevi everywhere.
Defeat the Nevi
More and more Nevi, they seem endless!
They just keep coming! I need to stop the storm.
There we go!
Defeat the Nevi in \n the Gravity Storm
I have to take out the Nevi in the storm.
I've gotta do something about the Nevi!
Kali: \n First up, clearing out the Nevi by the station!
Defeat the Nevi
Time to take out the stragglers.
That's the last of 'em!
More storms!?
Nevi Remaining
Next up is that Nevi!
That's the last one.
Kali: \n What are you doing!? Attack the Nevi not me!
Kali: \n Not bad!
Nice job!
Kali: \n Stop that!
Flick up/down on k : Lunar / Jupiter Styles \n Tap k : Revert to Normal Style
I've gotta do something about the Nevi!
